essential_mantras.mantra: ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः तत्सवितुर्वरेण्यं भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्
essential_mantras.transliteration: Om bhur bhuvah svah tat savitur varenyam bhargo devasya dhimahi dhiyo yo nah prachodayat
essential_mantras.translation: Om, earth, atmosphere, heaven. We meditate on the adorable light of the divine Sun. May it inspire our thoughts.
essential_mantras.name: Gayatri Mantra
essential_mantras.significance: Most sacred Vedic mantra for enlightenment

essential_mantras.mantra: ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम् उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान् मृत्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात्
essential_mantras.transliteration: Om tryambakam yajamahe sugandhim pushtivardhanam urvarukamiva bandhanan mrityor mukshiya mamritat
essential_mantras.translation: We worship the three-eyed Lord Shiva who is fragrant and nourishes. Like a cucumber from its vine, may we be liberated from death, not from immortality.
essential_mantras.name: Mahamrityunjaya Mantra
essential_mantras.significance: Mantra for health, healing, and overcoming death
essential_mantras.purpose: Protection from diseases and premature death

essential_mantras.mantra: ॐ पूर्णमदः पूर्णमिदं पूर्णात्पूर्णमुदच्यते पूर्णस्य पूर्णमादाय पूर्णमेवावशिष्यते
essential_mantras.transliteration: Om purnamadah purnamidam purnat purnamudachyate purnasya purnamadaya purnamevavashishyate
essential_mantras.translation: Om, that is whole, this is whole. From wholeness emerges wholeness. Taking wholeness from wholeness, wholeness remains.
essential_mantras.name: Purna Mantra

essential_mantras.mantra: सर्वे भवन्तु सुखिनः सर्वे सन्तु निरामयाः सर्वे भद्राणि पश्यन्तु मा कश्चिद्दुःखभाग्भवेत्
essential_mantras.transliteration: Sarve bhavantu sukhinah sarve santu niramayah sarve bhadrani pashyantu ma kashchid dukha bhag bhavet
essential_mantras.translation: May all be happy, may all be healthy, may all see auspiciousness, may none suffer
essential_mantras.name: Universal Peace Mantra

key_teachings.transliteration: Ishavasyam idam sarvam yat kincha jagatyam jagat
key_teachings.translation: All this is pervaded by the Lord - whatever moves in this moving world
key_teachings.significance: Opening verse establishing divine presence in everything

key_teachings.translation: By whom willed does the mind fall to its object?
key_teachings.significance: Inquiry into the source of consciousness

key_teachings.translation: Arise, awake, approach the great teachers and learn
key_teachings.significance: Call to spiritual awakening and learning
India's national motto - triumph of truth

essence_verses.translation: You have the right to perform actions, but never to the fruits of action

essence_verses.sanskrit: यदा यदा हि धर्मस्य ग्लानिर्भवति भारत
essence_verses.translation: Whenever dharma declines and adharma rises, I incarnate myself
Those who worship Me with exclusive devotion, I carry what they lack and preserve what they have
